title: Adult Science Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Online Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific terminology and workplace problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Applies a blended approach combining real-time video conferencing and asynchronous learning in smartphone-dominant constrained environments, with evening sessions tailored for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners pre-learn scientific principles through a flipped learning model with an engagement rate of over 80%
Learners propose three or more science-based solutions applicable to real-world tasks via collaborative problem-solving with peers in online discussions
Learners achieve 70+ points (out of 100) in scientific thinking assessment items through formative evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
